form.title: Delete Cloudike account
form.firstText: CLOUDIKE thank you for using Cloudike let us know why you decided to leave Cloudike and we will do our best to improve our service.
form.secondText: If you proceed, all files in your company account will be permanently deleted at midnight (12:00 AM) of today. Do you really want to delete your Cloudike account?

otherServise.placeholder: What service are you switching to?

uncomfortable.placeholder: What was uncomfortable while using Cloudike?

others.placeholder: Please let us know the details

form.message: We sincerely appreciate for using Cloudike. We will see you again with better service.
